# MineOS Typings

This package contains type declarations for [MineOS](https://github.com/IgorTimofeev/MineOS).

## Coverage

### APIs

- [ ] Color API
- [ ] Component API
- [ ] Compressor API
- [ ] Event API
- [ ] Filesystem API
- [x] [GUI API](https://github.com/Exeteres/opc-types/tree/master/packages/gui)
- [ ] Internet API
- [ ] Keyboard API
- [ ] Number API
- [ ] Paths API
- [ ] Screen API
- [x] System API
- [ ] Text API
